question:
Rainfed Area Development Programme (RADP):
  1. is a sub-scheme under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojna
  2. focuses on Integrated Farming System (IFS)
 Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct because Rainfed Area Development Programme is a sub-scheme under Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojna. Second statement is also correct because it focuses on Integrated Farming System (IFS) for enhancing productivity and minimizing risks associated with climatic variabilities.
